Features.WeatherEffects.Dialogue.Title: Weather Effects
Features.WeatherEffects.Dialogue.lblDust: Toggles the rendering of dust particle effects.
Features.WeatherEffects.Dialogue.lblFogE: Toggles the rendering of fog effects.
Features.WeatherEffects.Dialogue.lblMist: Toggles the rendering of mist effects.
Features.WeatherEffects.Dialogue.lblHail: Toggles the rendering of hailstone particle effects.
Features.WeatherEffects.Dialogue.lblLigh: Toggles the rendering of lightning flashing light effects.
Features.WeatherEffects.Dialogue.lblRain: Toggles the rendering of raindrop particle effects.
Features.WeatherEffects.Dialogue.lblSnow: Toggles the rendering of snowflake particle effects.
